title: andreasmeid.github.io
text:
Definition

Defining translational research

A plethora of attempts in various fields to define the term ‚Äútranslational research‚Äù (cancer medicine was most influential).
‚ÄúTranslational research transforms scientific discoveries arising from laboratory, clinical, or population studies into clinical applications to reduce cancer incidence, morbidity, and mortality.‚Äù
Three stages of tranlational research T1-T3 to foster the multidirectional integration of basic research, patient-oriented research, and population-based research



National Cancer Institute (USA) Translational Research Working Group (TRWG)

title: andreasmeid.github.io
text:
Attempts to define translational research


Many different approaches in the literature
‚ÄúTranslational research transforms scientific discoveries arising from laboratory, clinical, or population studies into clinical applications to reduce cancer incidence, morbidity, and mortality.‚Äù
Three stages of tranlational research T1-T3 to foster the multidirectional integration of basic research, patient-oriented research, and population-based research



National Cancer Institute (USA) Translational Research Working Group (TRWG)

title: andreasmeid.github.io
text:
Formal biosketch


Training

Pharmacist and Biometrician / Biostatistician (master thesis at Merck Serono, Clinical Pharmacokinetics)
Doctorate in Pharmacoepidemiology (PhEpi) at Heidelberg University Hospital
Habilitation in Clinical Pharmacology and PhEpi at Heidelberg University

Work experience

Group leader at Heidelberg Clinical Pharmacology & Pharmacoepi [1]
Biometric and PMx support of IITs
Pharmacological counselling support (model-based TDM)
Research focus [1,2]: Model-informed decision making with RWE and PMx




[1] Heidelberg University Hospital (UKHD) Homepage  [2] Netlify Research Profile
